trans-unit.source: Getting Ready to Use Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: 準備好使用 Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Getting Ready to Use Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: 準備好使用 Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: When Windows PowerShell is installed and started, consider the following setup options.
trans-unit.target: 安裝並啟動 Windows PowerShell 之後，請考慮下列安裝選項。

trans-unit.source: You can perform these tasks at any time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以隨時執行這些工作。

trans-unit.source: Install help files.
trans-unit.target: 安裝說明檔。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlets that are included in Windows PowerShell 3.0 do not come with help files.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 中包含的 Cmdlet 沒有說明檔。

trans-unit.source: However, you can use the [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) cmdlet to download and install the newest help files on your computer.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以使用 [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) Cmdlet 將最新的說明檔下載並安裝到您的電腦

trans-unit.source: When the files are installed, you can use the [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) cmdlet to display them right at the command line.
trans-unit.target: 安裝檔案之後，您可以使用 [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) Cmdlet 直接在命令列顯示。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [about_Updatable_Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/10bba75c-f4ac-4ca1-bbf3-8f34dd521ffe).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [about_Updatable_Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/10bba75c-f4ac-4ca1-bbf3-8f34dd521ffe)。

trans-unit.source: If you decide not to install the help files, you can still read the help topics online.
trans-unit.target: 如果您決定不要安裝說明檔，您仍然可以閱讀線上說明主題。

trans-unit.source: To find the online version of any cmdlet help topic, type: `Get-Help <CmdletName> -Online`.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找任何線上版本的 Cmdlet 說明主題，請輸入：`Get-Help <CmdletName> -Online`。

trans-unit.source: To browse the Windows PowerShell help topics in the TechNet Library, start at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=107116](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=107116).
trans-unit.target: 若要瀏覽 TechNet Library 中的 Windows PowerShell 說明主題，請從 [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=107116](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=107116) 開始。

trans-unit.source: Run scripts.
trans-unit.target: 執行指令碼。

trans-unit.source: To keep Windows PowerShell secure, the default execution policy on Windows PowerShell is **Restricted**.
trans-unit.target: 為了保護 Windows PowerShell 的安全，Windows PowerShell 上預設的執行原則是**受限制**的。

trans-unit.source: This policy allows you to run cmdlets, but not scripts.
trans-unit.target: 這項原則可讓您執行 Cmdlet，但不能執行指令碼。

trans-unit.source: To run scripts, use the [Set-ExecutionPolicy[PSITPro5_Security]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5690a0e1-495b-4e63-8280-65ead7bf01ab) cmdlet to change the execution policy to **AllSigned** or **RemoteSigned**.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行指令碼，請使用 [Set-ExecutionPolicy[PSITPro5_Security]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5690a0e1-495b-4e63-8280-65ead7bf01ab) Cmdlet，將執行原則變更為 **AllSigned** 或 **RemoteSigned**。

trans-unit.source: Only members of the Administrators group on the computer can run this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 只有電腦上的 Administrators 群組成員才能執行此 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [about_Execution_Policies [v4]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/347708dc-1515-4d74-978b-8334603472e6).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [about_Execution_Policies [v4]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/347708dc-1515-4d74-978b-8334603472e6)。

trans-unit.source: Enable remoting.
trans-unit.target: 啟用遠端功能。

trans-unit.source: The system is already configured for you to run remote commands on other computers.
trans-unit.target: 系統已為您設定成在其他電腦上執行遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: On Windows Server 2012 R2 and Windows Server 2012, the system is also configured to receive remote commands, that is, to allow other computers to run remote commands on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Server 2012 R2 和 Windows Server 2012 上，系統還會設定為接收遠端命令，也就是允許其他電腦在本機電腦上執行遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: To enable computers running other versions of Windows to receive remote commands, run the [Enable-PSRemoting](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/19437c28-33b8-4ac1-9113-8439cc8beffb) cmdlet on the computer that you want to manage remotely.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓執行其他 Windows 版本的電腦接收遠端命令，請在您要遠端管理的電腦上執行 [Enable-PSRemoting](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/19437c28-33b8-4ac1-9113-8439cc8beffb) Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Only members of the Administrators group on the computer can run this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 只有電腦上的 Administrators 群組成員才能執行此 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [about_Remote](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/9b4a5c87-9162-4adf-bdfe-fbc80b9b8970).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [about_Remote](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/9b4a5c87-9162-4adf-bdfe-fbc80b9b8970)。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: If remoting is enabled on a computer that is running Windows PowerShell 2.0, remoting is still enabled after you install Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰如果在執行 Windows PowerShell 2.0 的電腦上啟用了遠端功能，當您安裝 Windows Management Framework 3.0 之後仍會啟用遠端功能。

trans-unit.source: However, on Windows Server 2008 (not Windows Server 2008 R2), you must re\-enable remoting after installing Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在 Windows Server 2008 (不是 Windows Server 2008 R2) 上，您必須在安裝 Windows Management Framework 3.0 之後重新啟用遠端功能。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.source: [Installing Windows PowerShell](../setup/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md) [Starting Windows PowerShell [ps]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/8ec8c2d7-8e7c-4722-a3d2-498fe5739a8e)
trans-unit.target: [安裝 Windows PowerShell](../setup/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md) [啟動 Windows PowerShell [ps]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/8ec8c2d7-8e7c-4722-a3d2-498fe5739a8e)
